alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Harnett (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 05 at 2:24PM EDT until July 05 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Cumberland County in central North Carolina... Central Harnett County in central North Carolina... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 224 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Fayetteville, Lillington, Dunn, Godwin, Erwin, Eastover, Wade, Falcon, Linden, Anderson Creek, Timberlake and Raven Rock State Park. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
